optionLines: Exactly! I also spent a lot of time on the quiz.
Yeah! The quiz was so hard. The TA even said the grade would be curved.
Well... I don't know... Probably we are just gifted for that? - "Use humor"
Um... Not really. I just studied how to answer these questions yesterday. - "Express disagreement"
...maybe... do you guys really believe that? - "X"
